content.raw:
I see a test failure in `UNIT_Scene_TEST` with ogre2 that leads to an infinite recursion:

~~~
[ RUN      ] Scene/SceneTest.NodeCycle/ogre2
[Err] [BaseNode.hh:170] Cannot add self as a child node
[Err] [BaseNode.hh:170] Cannot add self as a child node
UNIT_Scene_TEST: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ogre-2.1-debbuilder/repo/OgreMain/src/Math/Array/OgreArrayMemoryManager.cpp:232: void Ogre::ArrayMemoryManager::destroySlot(const char*, Ogre::uint8): Assertion `slot < mMaxMemory && "This slot does not belong to this ArrayMemoryManager"' failed.
Aborted (core dumped)
~~~

with gdb:

~~~
[Err] [BaseNode.hh:170] Cannot add self as a child node
[Err] [BaseNode.hh:170] Cannot add self as a child node
UNIT_Scene_TEST: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ogre-2.1-debbuilder/repo/OgreMain/src/Math/Array/OgreArrayMemoryManager.cpp:232: void Ogre::ArrayMemoryManager::destroySlot(const char*, Ogre::uint8): Assertion `slot < mMaxMemory && "This slot does not belong to this ArrayMemoryManager"' failed.

Thread 1 "UNIT_Scene_TEST" received signal SIGABRT, Aborted.
__GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:51
51	../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
#0  __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:51
#1  0x00007ffff6920801 in __GI_abort () at abort.c:79
#2  0x00007ffff691039a in __assert_fail_base (fmt=0x7ffff6a977d8 "%s%s%s:%u: %s%sAssertion `%s' failed.\n%n", 
    assertion=assertion@entry=0x7ffff1cde660 "slot < mMaxMemory && \"This slot does not belong to this ArrayMemoryManager\"", 
    file=file@entry=0x7ffff1cde4d0 "/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ogre-2.1-debbuilder/repo/OgreMain/src/Math/Array/OgreArrayMemoryManager.cpp", 
    line=line@entry=232, function=function@entry=0x7ffff1cde6e0 "void Ogre::ArrayMemoryManager::destroySlot(const char*, Ogre::uint8)") at assert.c:92
#3  0x00007ffff6910412 in __GI___assert_fail (assertion=0x7ffff1cde660 "slot < mMaxMemory && \"This slot does not belong to this ArrayMemoryManager\"", 
    file=0x7ffff1cde4d0 "/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/ogre-2.1-debbuilder/repo/OgreMain/src/Math/Array/OgreArrayMemoryManager.cpp", line=232, 
    function=0x7ffff1cde6e0 "void Ogre::ArrayMemoryManager::destroySlot(const char*, Ogre::uint8)") at assert.c:101
#4  0x00007ffff1c48d53 in Ogre::ArrayMemoryManager::destroySlot(char const*, unsigned char) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.2.1.0

#6  0x00007ffff1c4d277 in Ogre::NodeMemoryManager::nodeMoved(Ogre::Transform&, unsigned long, unsigned long) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.2.1.0
#7  0x00007ffff1a7bb2d in Ogre::Node::parentDepthLevelChanged() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.2.1.0

[ RUN      ] Scene/SceneTest.NodeCycle/ogre2

Aborted (core dumped)
